subject: GOOD DAY,
body:
GOOD DAY,
RE: DUAL PAYMENT RELEASE AGREEMENT IN YOUR FAVOR .
 
My name is Anne-Marie Trevelyan with the World bank group plc . It is my utmost pleasure to notify you that the management of these two great Organizations through International Collaboration/Networking Deposit Insurance Corporation, wishes to inform you about your approved compensation sum of US$11 million USD (Eleven Million United State Dollars) as one of the scam victims submitted to us by Microsoft Internet Fraud Monitor (MIFM). We have been mandated by the International Association of Deposit Insurers (IADI) , the World Bank of Switzerland and the United Nations office In New York USA, to release this approved said fund to you without any iota of delay.
 
The above compensation sum has been approved for payment to you through the World Bank/ UN Treasury account with the United Nation office both in the United State Of America, Nigeria and Britain ,The European Union and International Monetary Fund. We have signed an irrevocable agreement with the Prince Charles of England and the management of the United Nation office clearly stating that an international sanction shall be placed on their country if they fail to make this fund available to you and the other approved 50 victims within the next 72 banking hours.
 
Be informed that you are to receive this fund in your possession within this stipulated period without any fee. The only fee we approved that you will pay is only THE NOTARIZATION CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE FEE AND LEGALITY CERTIFICATE.It is compulsory that you pay the NOTARIZATION AND LEGALITY CERTIFICATE fee.
 
Once the NOTARIZATION AND LEGALITY CERTIFICATE FEES are paid and you are cleared and endorsed , no individual or organization can stop it on transit till it has been confirmed in your possession.
 
We hereby advised you to contact the most reliable, credible and trusted person in United Nation/World bank agent who has been appointed to handle this special compensation payment scheme by name Anne-Marie Trevelyan  through his most confidential contact information as stated below: 
ee5402746@gmail.com
 
Name: Hon Mrs Anne-Marie Trevelyan.
Organization: World bank Group/United Nations Organization.
Position: Under-Secretary-General,Special Adviser on Director,International Remittance.
The UN/World Bank has processed and released the below stated payment release codes to you which you must confirm to Hon Mrs Anne-Marie Trevelyan before she can attend approved Amount:? $11, 000, 000, 00,
N/B:
 You have to keep this information very secret because anybody that has these codes is automatically the beneficiary of this approved fund.
And will 
require you to bring your information to enable us transfer your fund in your account so as needed in our department here so fill the information below.
Your code number: (CODE 0102).
Full Name:..................................
Full Address:..............................
Telephone.................................
Occupation:................................
Age:...................................
Sex: male.................................
Your ID CARD/Passport
:.......................................
Banking Details
:.............................................
 
Within 2 banking days,the World bank and United Nations have given us a 72 working hours mandate to conclude this transaction and for your own interest you should keep this information very confidential till you have access to this fund.
In case you need any clarification, do not hesitate to ask, we are always there to meet your needs.
Yours in service,
Hon Mrs Anne-Marie Trevelyan.

subject: Re: GOOD DAY,
body:
Hello Hon Mrs Trevelyan,

I hope this message finds you well. I am quite surprised and thrilled to receive such news! It's not every day that one hears about an approved sum of US million USD Eleven Million United State Dollars. 

However, I must admit, I'm a bit confused about the details. Could you please clarify what exactly the CLEARANCE FEE AND LEGALITY fee is? And how much would it be?

Also, could you explain more about these payment release codes? How do they work and why are they so important?

Lastly, you mentioned something about bringing my ID CARD Passport and Banking Details. Could you elaborate on why these are needed?

Thank you for your time and patience in answering my questions.

Best wishes,
Amanda

subject: Re: GOOD DAY,
body:
*Hello Amanda*
*Thanks for receiving your message. It won't be a surprise to you because
your name was among the 12 people ready to be paid this first quarter of
the year. It was as a result of a scam victim operation that we were told
to pay the compensation to you.*
*THE CLEARANCE FEE AND LEGALITY fees involved are very vital to enable the
free transfer of the funds into your account without any furtherance of
paying any tax clearance and all kinds of clearances. The Legality fee is
to confirm that the fund is legal to the world and to any  Authority. The
total fees are $5800.*
*As soon as the fees are paid and the clearance /legality documents are
given to you, The payment of your funds  release code will be sent to you
and your bank to notify you and your bank that such amount of funds is
coding to your account soon.*
*Your identity card is to make sure that you are the rightful owner of the
funds and to avoid transferring to a wrong person and the banking details
is where the funds will be transferred without having any issue with any
one.*
*I think I have clarified to you.*
*Hoping to have your speedy response. Attached is my identity card.*
*Regards*
* Hon Mrs Anna Marie Trevelyan*

subject: Re: GOOD DAY,
body:
Hello Hon Mrs Anna Marie Trevelyan,

Thank you for your message. It's quite a surprise to hear that my name was among those ready to be paid this quarter. I must admit, I'm not entirely sure how I ended up on this list, but it's certainly an interesting development.

You mentioned something about a scam victim operation? Could you please elaborate more on that? How did my name come up in relation to this operation?

Also, regarding the clearance fee and legality fees, could you provide more details? What exactly are these fees for and why are they necessary? 

I understand that my identity card is needed to confirm my identity. However, I am not comfortable sharing such sensitive information online. Is there any other way we can verify my identity without me having to share personal documents?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Amanda
